title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile-Based Numerical Information Representation Optimization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts and fundamental principles of data visualization
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the cognitive characteristics of various numerical information representations (tables/graphs) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can confirm through experimental data that table-based problems in mobile environments induce cognitive load 15% higher than graph-based problems.
Learners can self-diagnose engagement and cognitive load related to learning content with 90% accuracy using self-assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
